markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Necromantic Tenacity](/Feats.aspx?ID=886) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 47 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Lastwall Sentry](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=15)

**Prerequisites**
[Necromantic Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=884)

</column>

---

Your training against necromantic effects allows you to escape the worst of their touch. If you roll a success on a saving throw against a necromancy effect, you get a critical success instead; if you roll a critical failure on such a save, you get a failure instead.
name: Necromantic Tenacity
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 47 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Necromantic Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=884)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Reduce the power that necromantic effects hold over you.
</summary>
summary: Reduce the power that necromantic effects hold over you.
summary_markdown: Reduce the power that necromantic effects hold over you.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 8" pfs="Standard" > Necromantic Tenacity Source World Guide pg. 47 2.0 Archetype Lastwall Sentry Prerequisites Necromantic Resistance --- Your training against necromantic effects allows you to escape the worst of their touch. If you roll a success on a saving throw against a necromancy effect, you get a critical success instead; if you roll a critical failure on such a save, you get a failure instead.
